name: Stirring Up Trouble
description: As you embark on your culinary journey, you'll find yourself facing a challenge - the lack of precision in your kitchen tools. With no measuring spoons or accurate scales to rely on, you'll have to rely on your instincts and experience to create a dish that closely resembles the original recipe. Select the most fitting utensils from your limited arsenal, and strive to create a dish that is as close as possible to the original. The closer your dish is to the original recipe, the higher your score will be. Bon appétit, and good luck in your culinary endeavours!
